content: add a touch of floral charm to your hair accessories with this cute peony scrunchie inspired by the lush layered petals of a blooming peony this scrunchie brings both beauty and function to your handmade wardrobe the scrunchie is fun and easy to make you can use any fingering yarn leftovers from natural fibers to make it although silk is recommended for hair accessories in the pattern both written instructions with photos charts as well as video tutorial are included have fun
